SELECT t.* FROM (select z.* from (select CH_ID, CHARGER_NAME, CHARGER_DEPTH, CHARGER_GROUP, CHARGER_TELNUM, CHARGER_CELLNUM, GUBUN_USER, GUBUN_LIVE, REG_DATE, IM_ID from esb_IMCHARGER EI
where IM_ID LIKE '%' || #IM_ID# || '%'
)z)t

AND IM.IM_ID = #IM_NAME#
